body:
> /spec SpecCoding.Com All things to do with Spec Coding, Spec Driven Development (SDD), but all you Vibers, and analogue coders are welcome too!
1/speccoding.com 2 3/spec.home Every post 4/spec.news All things Model Context Protocol 5/spec.MCP All things Model Context Protocol 6/spec.MCP All things Model Context Protocol 7/spec.Agentic.Coding.Tools 8/spec.resources All things Model Context Protocol 9/spec. Note: This is not intended as a site about the No Code Lo Code platforms such as Lovable, N2N etc. They might make an occasional appearance but not a topic goal.
Tony Kay An AI Lead at Red Hat, and very early into Spec whilst we were, and still are, working out just exactly what "Spec Coding" isprobably home i ended up with the domain! But
Whilst I enjoy my work in inference and serving and have been doing more and more with vLLM, and the emerging llm-d on OpenShift(Kubernetes) my technical heart, or passions, lie much higher up the AI Stack in the realm of AI Engineering, Agentic AI, Context Engineering, MCP, and of course Spec Coding, hence this website.
My Toolchain OK, subject to change but
Claude Code (often inside Cursor; I'll write about why in the future) Specs, pretty much any of them including homespun but: spec-kit Kiro, Kiro was tremendously influential to me but too locked to AWS for day to day use Languages Python Ansible (ok: YAML, Jinja 2, Python but many of us consider it a language and well written The Poetry of DevOps)
title: About SpecCoding.Com
Spec Coding, Vibe Coding, Agentic AI driven Software Development
